setting.name: enableTimeout
setting.label: Enable time-out
setting.description: If enabled the call will be automatically transfered to the parking party once time specified in Park timeout elapses.

setting.name: parkTimeout
setting.label: Park time-out
setting.description: Time period (in seconds) after which the call is automatically transfered to the parking party.

setting.name: multipleCalls
setting.label: Allow multiple calls
setting.description: If checked, more than one call can be parked on the orbit at the same time. Calls are retrieved in the order they were parked.

setting.name: allowTransfer
setting.label: Allow transfer
setting.description: If checked callers parked on the orbit are able to transfer the call back to the parking party by pressing transfer key.

setting.name: transferKey
setting.label: Transfer key
setting.description: If transfered is allow, pressing this while the call is parked will transfer the call back to the parking party.
